column2: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has dedicated [Root.GetHerHis] life to strengthening [Root.Religion.GetName] faith.\nBy putting the scriptures of religion together and reinterpreting some of the old texts [Root.GetSheHe] managed to reform [Root.Religion.GetName] faith and make it a religion that will stand the test of time.

[Root.GetFirstNameWithNick] reformed the Aztec faith into a religion where [Root.GetSheHe] is considered divine. Believers will worship [Root.GetHerHim] and [Root.GetHerHis] descendants as living gods, which will greatly strengthen their power over the faithful.
